title: Add QHM and QHAdam optimizers
body_html:
Adds the quasi-hyperbolic momentum (QHM) and QHAdam optimization algorithms, based on Ma and Yarats (2018).

We also implement by proxy (adding convenience methods for parameterization) the following algorithms:

  • PID optimizer (Recht, 2018)
  • Synthesized Nesterov (Lessard et al., 2016)
  • Robust Momentum (Cyrus et al., 2018)
  • Triple Momentum (Scoy et al., 2018)
  • AccSGD (Kidambi et al., 2018)
  • NAdam (Dozat, 2016)
body_text:
Adds the quasi-hyperbolic momentum (QHM) and QHAdam optimization algorithms, based on Ma and Yarats (2018).
We also implement by proxy (adding convenience methods for parameterization) the following algorithms:

PID optimizer (Recht, 2018)
Synthesized Nesterov (Lessard et al., 2016)
Robust Momentum (Cyrus et al., 2018)
Triple Momentum (Scoy et al., 2018)
AccSGD (Kidambi et al., 2018)
NAdam (Dozat, 2016)
body:
Adds the quasi-hyperbolic momentum (QHM) and QHAdam optimization algorithms, based on [Ma and Yarats (2018)](https://arxiv.org/abs/1810.06801).

We also implement by proxy (adding convenience methods for parameterization) the following algorithms:

- PID optimizer [(Recht, 2018)](https://web.archive.org/web/20181027184056/http://www.argmin.net/2018/04/19/pid/)
- Synthesized Nesterov [(Lessard et al., 2016)](https://arxiv.org/abs/1408.3595)
- Robust Momentum [(Cyrus et al., 2018)](https://arxiv.org/abs/1710.04753)
- Triple Momentum [(Scoy et al., 2018)](http://www.optimization-online.org/DB_FILE/2017/03/5908.pdf)
- AccSGD [(Kidambi et al., 2018)](https://arxiv.org/abs/1803.05591)
- NAdam [(Dozat, 2016)](https://openreview.net/pdf?id=OM0jvwB8jIp57ZJjtNEZ)
